Articles.Content: Is [http://i.imgur.com/7drHiqr.gifv](http://i.imgur.com/7drHiqr.gifv)?
This is pretty impressive forum posting. **Hats off, flies out of hand because of hype speed.**

> 
> t minus 2 minutes! [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

Says 13 minutes for me...
I am now the hype.
Ok, now we can release 1.0 I have a new flag and I'm ready. Thanks for waiting for me! hehe
People will read this thread one day... and wonder if an actual train was driven?
My post view count went up by 5000 in 20 minutes
![gS5ywqZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/gS5ywqZ.png)
HarvesteR totally trolling the forums by looking at random threads and crap. LOL!

> 
> t minus 2 minutes! [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

it says 13 for me, remember to F5 it!

> 
> Keep posting, the faster we post the faster 1.0 will be released!

Actually, I think we might lag their servers to kingdom come, but WHO CARES! hype!
Due to the Hype Train crashing the internets, we regret to inform you 1.0 will not be released today.

> 
> t minus 2 minutes! [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

I had 13...
Lol I think KerbalX Crahsed for a minute

> HarvesteR totally trolling the forums by looking at random threads and crap. LOL!

Exactly this ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

In honor of the release, SpaceX is prepping the Falcon 9 HypeRocket for launch today:

![GtY4pLQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GtY4pLQ.jpg)
Well, he's not trying to troll, he's just looking at stuff.

> My post view count went up by 5000 in 20 minutes

That is my new favorite thing i witnessed your post view count shoot up that's amazing
...we are now on a **HYPE**rbolic trajectory...
we must have 3500 posts
